content: **mini brick can cozy with base** keep that pesky can sweat from making your beverage slippery with this cozy that fits on a standard size 12oz aluminum can get creative and use a combination of your favorite colors to customize your beverage they also make great gifts especially in the colors of their favorite sports team the pattern requires basic knowledge of crochet and crochet stitches including chaining working in a magic_ring working in the round single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet increasing working in a chain space and working in the back loop this pattern
